entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 6:22AM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...INCREASED FIRE DANGER THIS AFTERNOON AND EARLY EVENING... Gusty winds combining with warming temperatures and a drier air mass will bring elevated fire danger conditions this afternoon and early evening.
